description: The animals will be exhumed from mass graves next year to prevent pollution, the government says.
title: Covid: Denmark to dig up millions of mink culled over virus
title_page: Covid: Denmark to dig up millions of mink culled over virus - BBC News
maintext: The two burial sites are highly controversial, as one is near a bathing lake and the other not far from a source of drinking water. Residents have complained about the potential risk of contamination.
